remarks.para: The BNF for node types within a document is:
remarks.code: Xml := StartInput Whitespace Element Whitespace EndInput Whitespace := (Text | Comment)* // Text is whitespace only Element := StartElement ElementContent EndElement ElementContent := (Element | Text | Comment | CData)* StartElement := WS_XML_NODE_TYPE_ELEMENT EndElement := WS_XML_NODE_TYPE_END_ELEMENT Text := WS_XML_NODE_TYPE_TEXT Comment := WS_XML_NODE_TYPE_COMMENT CData := WS_XML_NODE_TYPE_CDATA Text* WS_XML_NODE_TYPE_END_CDATA StartInput := WS_XML_NODE_TYPE_BOF EndInput := WS_XML_NODE_TYPE_EOF

summary.para: The start of a CDATA section (i.e. <![CDATA[)
The end of a CDATA section (i.e. ]]>)
The final node of an xml stream.
The first node of an xml stream.
